The tweet was posted by the MEC for Econ: Tourism and Environmental Affairs on November 10, 2018, and has gained significant engagement with over 1,580 retweets, 4,400 likes, and 233 comments.
The Mozambican presidency confirmed the: 3. The President of Mozambique, Filipe Jacinto Nyusi, inaugurated the Maputo-KaTembe bridge and the connecting roads, including the toll located in KaTembe. This information was stated in a Portuguese document.
The KwaZulu: Natal Tourism Authority also confirmed the existence of the bridge and highlighted how it has reduced the travel time from Kosi Bay to Maputo.
